name: Sack, Appellant, v. Glens Falls Insurance Company

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Sack, Appellant, v. Glens Falls Insurance Company.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Patterson.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John A. Metz, Jr., with him John A. Metz, A. C. Teplitz and Metz & Metz, for appellant.
John E. Evans, Jr., with him John E. Evans, Sr. and Evans, Ivory & Evans, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Sack, Appellant, v. Glens Falls Insurance Company.
Argued October 4, 1948.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
John A. Metz, Jr., with him John A. Metz, A. C. Teplitz and Metz & Metz, for appellant.
John E. Evans, Jr., with him John E. Evans, Sr. and Evans, Ivory & Evans, for appellee.
November 8, 1948:
